mackron/miniaudio

Single file audio playback and capture library

Related repos

  • Music player for local audio files on macOS
  • Generates playlists through sonic analysis of local audio files
  • audio foundation model for understanding, generation, and conversation
  • Generates binaural audio from video and text
  • Manages audio devices from the macOS menu bar
  • Audio streamer for Raspberry Pi
  • offline macOS music player with playlists and library browsing
  • Screen and audio capture for AI integration
  • Transcodes Audible files into mp3 or m4b
  • macOS screen recording tool with audio and overlay features
